description: Tank Side Story is an homage to a great handheld tactical game series, thrusting its legacy and aesthetic into modern, competitive gameplay. Outmaneuver your opponent using classic military tactics on a grid with a flair for the dramatic.

name: Man of the World
description: Role-playing game in an open world. Battles, music, love, war, trade, ships, mysticism, new and old lands, travel, ranks of mercenaries, slaves and friendship. All this awaits you in this game. A game with new possibilities for you.

name: Secrets of a Campfire
description: Escaping isn't always a bad thing. Sometimes a timeout is all it takes to get back your peace of mind. That's why I'm here. To take a walk, row a boat, light up a campfire and write about stuff and all I need you to do is just read my letters.

name: Pon Para and the Great Southern Labyrinth: Love and Shadows
description: When the gods of your parents come to claim you, unlock the ability to select a third option, the goddess Amiria, and unlock a whole new set of gifts in your quest to save reality from the dark god of destruction!

name: Electronic Super Joy: Bonus Content Pack!
description: This DLC contains the soundtrack (Parts 1 & 2), an all new, giant HD digital version of the Electronic Super Joy Poster, and new bonus levels 'Thin Ice' & 'Treacherous Footing', each with a new world theme!

name: Lost Ed
description: Lost Ed is a game to bring a sense of nostalgia to old games. It does not contribute to innovative mechanics, but tries to offer a gaming experience from the 80s and 90s.

name: Tiddy Bounce
description: Welcome to Tiddy Bounce! Tiddy Bounce is a classic platformer with everyone's favorite, bouncing tiddies! The levels scroll forever, so you have infinite tiddies!

name: Forgotten Fragments
description:
Help Enid, Ryder and Dayen recover the Forgotten Fragments in this beautiful pixel art adventure, where your puzzle-platformer skills will be put to the test!

Uncover all the mysteries in this Forgotten realm.

name: The Outpost
description: Six robots have crash-landed on a beach on a distant planet and they have one job to do: chill out and socialize while they wait for help to arrive. Visit the far reaches of space in this new Social VR experience where each participant controls a unique procedurally generated robot avatar.

name: Square vs Triangles
description: Square vs Triangles is a old school 2D platformer with a minimalistic and beautiful art style and challenging gameplay mechanics inspired by 90's classics.

name: Black Gold: Wild West Story
description: Join the early 20th century oil boom! In this game you will hire people, build your own oil field, extract crude oil, fight obstacles and crises what eventually will bring you fortune you’ve never dreamt of!

name: Synth Swinger
description: Will you find the end?

name: Sukakko
description: The new strategy wargame, in a retro Japanese atmosphere. Choose secretly your own army at the start of the game, and use your well-trained tactics to defeat your opponent!

name: Sweet Home Puzzle
description: Absolute fan or simple puzzle enthusiast? Sweet Home Puzzle will satisfy you! Choose your puzzle from more than 100 images, choose your music and play relaxed like at home.

name: Road Home
description: Road Home is a classic 2D platformer where you tries to overcome dangers and collect treasures. Combine speed, accurate jumps and different items capabilities to evade traps and enemies and find hidden places.

name: Save 2020
description: Help a fellow archer overcome these big and mean monsters that are ahead. A Run and Gun challenging game with a variety of monsters and creatures, o and also bad people.

name: Doomsday Hero
description: This is a zombie shooting game, shooting zombies can help you relieve pressure, bring happiness.

name: Jumps VR
description: Enter a world of sky islands and jump your way to the finish, now in absurdly fast VR!

name: Chibi Horror: The School
description: Chibi Horror: The School is a japanese and anime themed horror game inspired by horror games like Slender, Amnesia, among others.

name: Mystical Mayhem
description: You are Bob Mayhem, a streamer. You just had the revelation that in order to capture the attention of the world towards your streams, you would have to do something so outrageously stupid, brave and unthinkable that no other streamer in the world would have dared to do, ghost hunting.

name: Russian Anime
description: What should anime look like in Russia? The only way. Your task is to prove that your style is the best in the area.

name: Transfer of Essence
description: A fantasy tactical rpg /dungeon crawler where you decide how to spend action points to proceed. Play through each character's experience of the events to find out the mystery behind what happened.

name: The Menacing
description: The Menacing is a 1-4 player online co-op survival where you and your friends explore different environments and work together to survive. Search for key objectives in order to escape and complete challenges to earn new unlocks, all whilst avoiding the bloodthirsty threats and other dangers.

name: Birthright
description: Try to rise for power in a medieval sandbox world. Where Lords and Families battle each other for the utlimate power. Become your own Lord, Merchant or Adventurer getting entangled in the lands history.

name: Dungeon Dan
description: Open world role playing game where you control a schoolboy who must save his village and make mom proud.

name: Glitch Assassin
description: Glitch Assassin is a Sci-Fi VR shooter which puts the player in the shoes of an assassin tasked with maintaining order in a simulated world. Complete various missions eliminating threats to the AI's directive of saving the planet from extinction...

name: Destructive Contraptions
description: Destructive Contraptions is a physics based sandbox simulator where you can create huge contraptions with dominos, balls, canons, pivot etc. and watch them fall apart and destroy giant structures, cities, buildings without having to worry about the legal and life threatening issues.

name: Astralis
description: Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekseï Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep to face a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship "Astralis" lost in an unkown part of the universe. Astralis is FPS horror sci-fi game with retro graphics and sounds.

name: Cyber Noah
description: Classic arcade game, improved by role-playing model and integrated into the story. A fascinating interactive narrative about the formation of A.I. Decisions affect the gameplay, reveal the game mechanics and lead to one of the 16 main endings.

name: Hoplichess
description: A turn-based strategy game set in ancient Greece. Lead your very own Greek forces to victory in this simple but endearing game of ingenuity and tactics. Master the command of your troops, dominate the field, and prove your mettle as a general.

name: Wayfarers: Call of Osiris
description: Jack and Leila Dawes explore real Egyptian pyramids and temples and delve into their mythical underworlds to free themselves from an ancient curse. The extensive traversing and fighting may take a toll on their bodies, but even greater is the burden of the dark calamity tearing at their souls...

name: Rounded
description: Unique ، quite a challenging puzzle game. An experience with wonderful views.

name: ThrustWorks
description: ThrustWorks is jetpack flying combat game with enemy turrets, coin collecting, and vivid views in 4 unique levels. PC and VR support included.

name: Cards & Crystals
description: Match3 meets Trading Card Game! Collect cards, level up your heroes, and build decks to defeat your foes in this fast-paced puzzle/strategy game.

name: Cyber Factories
description: Cyber Factories is an Automation and Base Building game in a cyberpunk universe. You lead a small colony of human remnants. Help them to survive, expand and gather enough resources to leave Earth for their new home planet.

name: StrayDoll Conflict
description: This is a side-view tactics game.

name: Training Lab
description: A laboratory simulator to do virtual experiments in a simulated laboratory for training

name: Heart of Mithras
description: Lead the combat team of your district to the top of the ladder, in the epic battle game of the megacity Mithras. Play a detailed management game. Recruit new soldiers, hire trainers to help your team to develop, build up your new base and play epic tactical battles in a complex simulation.

name: GOC Royale
description: GOC Royale is a massively multiplayer card game that takes you to randomly generated islands to take part in battles to the death.

name: The Flawless Cup
description: An urban fantasy platformer-adventure with a branching narrative, The Flawless Cup reacts to the choices you make on your quest for caffeine. Featuring a cast of caffeine starved characters and hand-crafted narrative that changes with you!

name: Quarantine Run
description: Quarantine Run is an cinematic story based, endless runner game with multiplayer, where you try to survive the pandemic by running and keeping up to date with the interesting news via Pandemi Radio. The multiplayer game mode is currently a beta, your support will help in the completion of this Game.

name: Ouija
description: A top down exploration horror/adventure game where you use a spirit board to find clues, fulfil last wishes of the departed, learn secrets, and hopefully track down a serial killer before they find you.

name: Star Aegis
description: Star Aegis is an old school, wave-based arcade shmup without shooting. Choose which side of the ship to protect with your shields and reflect the enemies bullets back at them or just ram them down with your shield.

name: The Deepening: Eco-Offensive
description: Follow along with Kyle, and experience the events prior to those of The Deepening book series from a neo-retro 2D perspective when you run, jump, and shoot through waves of beasts to make our trek to the stars more safe.

name: CloseCall
description: An explosive racing fantasy.

name: Cytoclash
description: Cytoclash is an action-packed lightgun-style shooter that calls upon you as Earth's best hope against a monstrous alien invasion! Suit-up and blast your way through hordes of enemies and massive bosses in the debut release from Setrino Software!

name: Shank the Cop
description: A multiplayer mind game. Cops have to decide who is a threat and who is not. Decide who is your opponent and shoot them down, or play as the criminal and shank the cop!

name: Yuha's Nightmares
description: This is a simulation game about the nightmares that our main character Yuha suffers from. You will explore the surrealistic world that is full of unexpected events. The deeper part of Yuha's consciousness is depicted through the flip side of the 3D world.

name: My City and Army
description: Strategy game of building war

name: Spellbound : The Magic Within
description: Spellbound: The Magic Within is a choose your own adventure style visual novel. Jump into a world of Magic, Witchcraft and Mystery as a magician in training. Interact with a host of unusual characters. Choose from multiple schools of magic, bond with your tutor, and maybe even save the world.

name: Don't Blink
description: DON'T BLINK is a Virtual Reality horror game where you escape an from an INFINITE basement. Run from a creature that CAN'T MOVE WHILE YOU WATCH. The creatures only move when you can't see, so keep a close eye and DON'T BLINK.

name: Apocalyptic World
description: The virus has spread to the entire planet, all people have turned into zombies.

name: Retexo Mori
description: Retexo Mori is a Pac-Man-like game in first person, with bullet hell elements and an aesthetic that clashes early 90's FPS pixel-art with vaporwave.

name: Sokoban Gianta
description: Classic box-pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with a mentally stimulating giant level.

name: Brushlings Pale Moon
description: Brushlings is built for PC and projected to be on the Nintendo Switch. You play as Gaia in a solo campaign to restore color to the world before it's lost for good. Use a variety of elemental abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies to save the world from becoming colorless forever.

name: Immunity Tales
description: The tale of a group of immune cells around the body full of fights against several micro-organisms, challenges and puzzles will keep you glued to the screen until the end of the game.

name: Chillax VR
description: Go to different beautiful, relaxing and chill environments in Chillax VR. Take a break away from the real world and virtually by stepping into a land you only wished you could travel to. Become involved in the game and the environment where you not only play the game - but also become part of the game.

name: Waves of Death
description: Following the tragic mistake of military scientists, a new generation of a viral compound has spread through the city allowing the dead to come back to life... All the dead, but also the bloodthirsty Bosses. Jake has to cross the city to save his loved-ones.The countdown begins!

name: Wings of Legends
description: Wings of Legend is the first person VR game. You are the dragon rider. Do you want to fly? Ride the dragon and fly! Start an exciting journey through a sharp cliffs, incredibly beautiful canyons and breathtaking views.

name: Seafarers
description: Set sail on your adventure to become the number one merchant in all the world! Trade, fight, or negotiate your way to the top in your own style!

name: King of Sweets
description: King of Sweet is a first-person action game with strategy and farming elements. You have to take on the role of the young heir to the throne in the Kingdom of Sweets and return it to its former glory.

name: XpCade
description: Play virtual arcade machines, and program them using a new programming language. Go out explore, edit and play mission maps.

name: Eat'n Eaten
description: A tower defense but instead of towers you have a buzzing ecosystem of plants and creatures with needs : your organisms need to eat in order to evolve and survive! Try to maintain balance of the food chain until you annihilate the very last invader!

name: Block Me.
description: I am just a student testing steam. Do not expect much.

name: President's Sniper Shooting
description: President's car is being chased by militant's cars. You have limited time to shoot them all. You are the president's die-hard loyalist.

name: Dungeon of Eyden
description: Dungeon of Eyden is a hack & slash co-op game, with fun mechanics and simple, yet eye-catching graphics and an every time world it re-create itself.

name: OmniGrav
description: A gravity-bending 2D platformer where you are tasked with retrieving items from a hostile planet. In order to get around you must bend the laws of time and space by shifting the direction of gravity and reversing the flow of time.

name: Breath of the Wasteland
description: Breath of the Wasteland is a light wasteland adventure indie game. You can drive a variety of cars with different styles and feel, equip them with different cannons to fight, experience the joy of fraudulent buying and selling, go questing, collect Easter eggs and explore whole wasteland.

name: The Island
description: The Island a computer game with an open world and a first-person view in the genre of survival.

name: No Light
description: The objective of this game is to scare you, you will not wait, you will run ... A Guard against five demons.

name: Askara
description: Askara is a rogue-like turn-based tactics game, you choose how long each run takes, from a half an hour, to a few days if you want to! Multiple layers of mechanics mesh together to ensure that every run will be unique. It is easy to pick up, but will take years to master.

name: My Retail Store
description: Ever wanted to run your retail store? Now you can! You play the role of an Artist who inherited a retail store. It is now your job to manage and handle day to day business of your store while pursuing your hobby of painting.

name: Mastermine
description: Mastermine is a 3D, minesweeper inspired puzzle game - solve complex boards over a 3D Rubik's Cube-esque map.

name: Mad Chess
description: Mermaids, Angels and Dragons join the classic game of Chess as 3 additional factions with their own units and abilities. Madness? No, this is Mad Chess!

name: Cradle-18
description: You wake up on a deserted space station on the orbit of unknown planet. How did you come here? What happened with crew? What is happenning here? You have to find out. And also you have to survive here because the station is fraught with many dangers.

name: Escape From Monsterland
description: A sci-fi survival game with an all non-human cast. The Player is Captain Buster Krabnoid who uses a variety of weapons to fight his way through numerous monsters in an attempt to ESCAPE FROM MONSTERLAND!

name: Mojica
description: "Only the keyboard is used in this game!" Beat looming enemies with your typing skill! Switch lanes and defeat enemies by typing letters. This is an all-new typing game with strategy and a thrill.

name: Freus
description: Freus is a 2D platform adventure game. You will complete your revenge with the abilities given by THE devil in impressive pieces adventures.

name: Pokoh
description: Pokoh is a sliding puzzle game inspired by good old classic Sokoban but with its own flavour and mechanics. Your beloved wife has been stolen from your hands and it's your duty to rescue Pokah and bring her home.

name: Plecos Keep
description: A 2D platformer where you can harpoon oceanic enemies, explore and keep the ocean free from chaos.

name: Gunjump Before Dinner
description: 2D precision platformer with tight and responsive controls. Gunjump your way through challenging obstacle course.

name: Esper Uprising: Hearts of Crystal
description: Valterra's newly legalized esper hunts increase business opportunities for smugglers like yourself, but only if you compromise your morals and betray the espers in your crew first.

name: Among Waifus
description: Months in space, in a starship full of waifus. The sci-fi dream of us all.

name: Street Massacre
description: Street gangs fight among themselves in the middle of the city at night. Whoever manages to live will see the light of day!

name: FBI Agent Simulator
description: You are an FBI agent. Look for the clues, follow the leads, investigate, interview the suspects and find a culprit. The fate of the victims and their families lies in your hands – can you meet the challenge?

name: Ultra Imposer
description: A sci-fi action shooter virtual reality game. Pilot the Ultra Imposer drone and eradicate the enemy army with your blasters or lock-on to multiple enemy targets to unleash a barrage of seeker missile destruction.

name: IronSurvival
description: Seven months after the Montereale epidemic south of the park, several survivors will have to face many obstacles that will have to defend themselves from various attacks by bandits and hordes of zombies

name: Shadow Lost
description: What dark and twisted things are happening in the strange town?

name: Ladder Box
description: Ladder Box is a 3D puzzle game. Navigate boxes with mesmerizing mechanics, utilize the unmovable boxes to make one of the moving ones reaches the only exit!

name: VR Spaceship Battle
description: Try the classic spaceship arcade game in a 21st century VR headset.

name: Dimension of Dreams
description: "Dimension of Dreams" is a unique strategy card game with rogue-like elements. You play an adventurer who embarks on an exhilarating journey through the dream world, where you engage in thrilling, fluid combat. Obtain and add cards strategically to your deck via exploration and upgrading existing cards.

name: Midnight Cipher
description: Welcome to Sol Tollere, a city rebuilding from the EMP detonation disaster, which crippled industrial technology everywhere. Communication between people is being controlled by mega-corporations, acting as the digital postal service. Apply today to earn a living delivering these precious messages!

name: Uboat Commander
description: "U-boat Commander" is an upcoming strategy game in which players take a Wolfpack commander role in the Second World War. Their task is to plan, synchronize, and execute u-boat attacks on Allied convoys in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Heroes Must Diee
description: Tired of quest going, monster killing "Heroes" who keep raiding your house for household items. You build traps and hire minions to fight them off. Stop these Heroes from taking what is yours. TLDR: build a dungeon & be a dungeon master !

name: Denki Bounce
description: Denki Bounce is the worlds first trampoline-based "Bounce 'Em Up!" Blast, Reflect, Evade and Electrify your way to victory! A high-paced, addictive, VS battle-sport game with rich cartoon visuals awaits!

name: Marshall Mellow
description: Marshall Mellow is a game about jumping up blocks as they fall.

name: Dancing In the Moonlight
description: "Dancing Under the Moon" is a single-player only 3d bullet-running action game. Enjoy the sensation of being overwhelmed by a barrage of bullets in 3d space.

name: The Owl Quest
description: The Owl Quest is an unpretentious little pixel art point'n click adventure game that aims to immerse the player in the atmosphere of the first adventure games of the 80s and 90s.

name: The Passage of Time
description: Challenge the passage of time and try to survive in dark dungeons while fighting with their inhabitants. Create unique weapons, develop skills and explore caves. But be careful - time is running out ...

name: Schwerpunkt
description: Schwerpunkt is a World War 2 military simulation game. Take control of hundreds of units over a large frontline, making daring manoeuvres to push your enemy back. Fight in one of the scenarios given or make your own in the map maker.

name: The Next Jianghu I
description: "The next Jianghu I" is a game that combines the jianghu, martial arts, collection, cultivation and war chess. You can experience the adventures and anecdotes in the Jianghu. Where do we not meet in life? Who are heroes? Next stop, Jianghu!

name: Project G.A.E.A.
description: The gods gree left the world in ruins. Explore the vast islands left over by the overflown river Styx and uncover artifacts with the power of the gods to appease the river and enable passage to the dead.

name: CipherPilot
description: Crash across 100+ levels divided into 10+ worlds, each world introducing it's own unique hazards and challenges. Daily, weekly and monthly playlists keeps the challenge fresh as you compete for the top spot.

name: Gladiators Manager
description: Gladiators Manager puts you in the position of a lanista responsible for training and managing gladiators. Participating in brutal arena fights and cruel intrigues will grant you riches and glory in the ancient Roman Empire.

name: Facettes
description: Explore the story of Facettes as you play as a woman discovering her homosexuality and overcoming her identity crisis. This self-questioning protagonist channels her introspection in her RPG inspired fantasy world: Facettes.

name: Earth Warrior
description: Earth Warrior is an experience from blasting pollution to exploring beautiful terrains. Your choice. Tundra. Wildfire. Ocean.

name: Dicey Krime: Traveler of Time
description: After a long time of planning their attack, they are finally ready: Dicey and his group of friends have the mission to fight crime and injustice all over the world. With your help they will combat their enemies travelling to various cities in time.

name: Orbit Outlaws
description: Orbit Outlaws is the definitive physics-based arena combat game. Use gravity to pull off impossible shots in competitive and casual multiplayer. Choose your gun, chassis, and pilot, then upgrade and optimize your loadout as you progress against rival pilots.

name: Void Arena
description: VOID ARENA is a fast paced first person RPG with classic ARPG combat & loot Systems. Featuring a multiplayer game mode which uniquely combines PVE & PVP.

name: Combat Labs
description: No two rounds are the same. Memorise each weapon and master the movement in a fast-paced PS1-styled movement shooter in which you are pitted against an opponent of equal footing - except every round, the load-outs are randomised. Who will win? It only depends on your luck with your load-out.

name: Airline Technician
description: Airline Technician is a game about the important job of Airport Line Technicians. Their responsibilities include coordinating ramp operations and aircraft movement via radio, fueling, towing aircraft, operating ground support equipment, reporting malfunctions and keeping the airport operational.

name: Frop
description: Join Frop as he adventures through mountains, dungeons, and many other places. What's happening in the Kingdom? What's this dark essence? This game will have you solving puzzles, learning spells, battling in a turn based manner, and crafting.

name: Yabai Mantis VR
description: What if you suddenly encounter a mantis bigger than you one day? YABAI MANTIS VR is a battle simulation game that reproduces such a situation that everyone thinks through a VR experience. Use various weapons and your own movements to defeat the giant mantis that appears in front of you.

name: Gold Diggers
description: A Life Simulator game in The Age of Aquarius

name: Laser Burst
description: Laser Burst is a logical puzzle game that requires you to methodically rotate and position double sided mirrors that direct lasers through a maze to pop balloons.

name: Holy Chick!
description: In a world where bloodthirsty chickens have taken over the planet, it’s hard to keep your cool. You find shelter in a suspicious camper trailer, but angry beaks are pecking at the windows outside. Time is running out. Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?

name: Rogue Snow: Everwinter
description: Six months have passed since the Everwinter began, covering the world in a permanent frost. Now it is up to a lone scavenger to help his camp reach the equator, in hopes of escaping the harsh climate and the roaming monster snowmen known only as the Droves.

name: Detour Bus
description: Snap together inconvenient road pieces to build ridiculously convoluted highways, and guide the dysfunctional Flowers family on a psychedelic road trip across post-infrastructure America.

name: Input Out
description: Input Out is a Puzzle game where the player commands a circle to the goal by Inputting movement commands. Navigate your way through 100 levels filled with different threats and interesting obstacles. Can you Input your way Out?

name: Snow Trail
description: Snow Trail is a puzzle game that revolves around pushing snow blocks in order to reach a goal. Snow blocks can be pushed into water to create bridges, placed on pressure plates to open certain areas and much more! With 100 levels and multiple mechanics, each level has its own tricks!

name: Rise of Zombies
description: Rise Of Zombies is a first person shooter action zombie killing game with endless rounds of increasing number and strength of the zombies you will face a strong monster that tries to kill you. you kill zombies to get score points to buy weapons. you are soldier trapped in an excavation site.

name: Rubble Bubble
description: Get ready to Rubble! Align 3+ colors to clear pieces.

name: Little Brother's Turn
description: Relive the good old days of being forced to watch your sibling play YOUR games with this uber-frustrating, procedurally generated platformer.

name: Techlie
description: Techlie is a first-person shooter action game that progresses part by part, where you fight in another dimension as the scientist named "Aziz".

name: Distortion VR
description: The world of Distortion exists in a Cyberpunk mega city in the near future. It is a world where technology is being abused and the citizens are being controlled by thought from birth. What's real is uncertain.

name: Paper Jam!
description: If you love word games and VR, you'll love playing Paper Jam! Can you make enough words before the timer runs out? Can you solve anagrams to unlock the story of the robots in career mode? How about a quick game, just for the high score?

name: Goner
description: Goner is a thrilling new take on survival / adventure genres, telling the story about a son that, following his missing mother's researchy, will get him to an unknown island... Stranded and alone, your rescue mission will turn quickly into a desperate fight for survival.

name: River Attack
description: River Attack is a shootting up style game 2D, which combines harmoniously colored scenes with aerial shooting battle! Evolve your ship to defeat an alien invasion that has the technology to control human combat vehicles. Will you be able to defeat an army of ships to save your girl and the planet?!

name: Space One
description: Space one has been postponed at this time.

name: Chinese Sudoku
description: Chinese Sudoku is a special, innovative Sudoku game featuring over 300+ beautiful puzzles.

name: Survive the Dark
description: Survive The Dark is a story-driven, physics-based first person simulator in a post-apocalyptic mountain overrun by zombies. Clinging to life, you find yourself in the mountain full of zombies. Your goal is to survive in the depths of a nightmarish environment using truly intuitive means to escape.

name: Crazy Engineer
description: Build your own chain reaction machine without limitations, with various objects and as big as you want it to be.

name: PePiBo: Peregrino Pinata Bowling
description: The ancient evil Lava Dragon has awakened the Volcano of Maconda! It is time for you, young Peregrino, to save the island by challenging the Dragon to... a Piñata Bowling duel! Use your bowling skills and ingenuity to clear surprising piñata bowling puzzles!

name: Zakumba: Astraia
description: Zakumba: Astraia is an African action-adventure RPG set in the fictional city of Pyrophestus, featuring a young golem- building prodigy caught in a worker’s uprising. Along the way she meets a friend who introduces her to the perils of the larger world, and also gives her the strength to face them.

name: Beast Brigade
description: The new shooter from the team at Intrinsic Games, delivers an intense, cinematic action experience bringing monsters and modern combat together. Beast Brigade arms players with an arsenal of advanced and powerful weaponry, and a wide variety of monsters to assist them in battle.

name: Burkov: Point of Contact
description: Burkov is a competative shooter set in fictional place on the border between Finland and Russia. In a turbulent world contractors work to secure classified intel from secret facilites and closed off areas. Lawless individuals seek riches by forming factions and fight to cease control over areas.

name: Shape VS Shapes
description: Shape VS Shapes is a fast-paced arcade game. Blast your way through 50+timed levels or go for a high score in Endless Mode!

name: Cybloc
description: This unique fast paced skill based 2D platform game will put your game play skills to the test. Your goal is simple but your time is limited. Come and compete for that top spot on the global leader-boards and be the best Cybloc player of this strange electrical realm.

name: Soobmarinno
description: Explore the depths of the ocean filled with dangerous inhabitants. Encounter monstrous creatures, collect the ancient gold, travel through this amazing lost world and find out its secrets.

name: Minesweeper Match
description: Here is Minesweeper for Expert Players! Can play solo with AI, dual via INTERNET or on LOCAL.

name: The Crow King
description: The Crow King is a 2D side-scrolling action-strategy with a unique Handmade style, where you have to explore and gather resources to improve your strength until you lead your army to victory.

name: Egregor Indoctrination
description: Egregor Indoctrination tells an intriguing story in an episodic and laconic manner, combining elements of Metroidvania and Visual Novel genres.

name: Confined VR
description: Can you solve the deadly puzzle and escape confinement?!

name: Bottle Journey
description: it's a bottle, it can be very difficult! this game is very difficult, it is divided into several levels and each level will be more difficult and more difficult, but you can help overcome these difficulties!

name: Animal Liberation Squad
description: A stealthy short tale about underground animal activism. Lead a team of activists, rescue animals, break expensive machinery, graffiti walls and celebrate with vegan food at the Twisted Almond.

name: Ink
description: Change the dim world, fill it with light. Each inky struggle improves your sight. "Sometimes words alone can't paint the whole picture." A VR game about depression.

name: I'm Russia
description: Shoot’em up platformer inspired by Russia the beginning of the 90s and old retro games.

name: Crimson Core
description: Crimson Core is a turn-based RPG with a choice-driven narrative. Each choice can push the game into a different path unlocking multiple endings.

name: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator
description: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator is a simulation management game, where you step into the challenge of opening your own tattoo studio. Design. Tattoo. Upgrade.

name: Finsterwald
description: “Finsterwald” is a survival horror adventure VR and 3D game, based on Dark Ages period European myths about Ancient Guardian of the Forests – Waldschrat. Observing the behavior of visitors, he watches over the peace and safety of trees, birds, animals, other fosterlings on the entrusted territory.

name: Space Rats
description: Space Rats is a combat racing platformer where sci-fi animals compete in variable gravity environments. Race by using parkour, jetpacks, and powerups to win!

name: Garrison: A Mercenary's Story
description: Garrison is a Mercenary, who is trying to find new hope after getting chased out of his born and raised country on another land.

name: Intelligence Operation
description: Intelligence Operation is a War GameAs an Intelligence Operation, as an elite soldier in a highly trained special operations unit, your unique skills in the art of tracking, target detection, surveillance and firing accuracy will bring mission success.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball V9
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a flexible, transparent, and hyper-accurate computerized baseball simulator that allows gamers to play games, series, tournaments, and entire seasons, using players from any baseball season in history.

name: The Last Surface
description: This is a short minimal,relaxed game

name: Crazy Rabbit AntiLogic
description: Hey man. You need urgently to help the Rabbit to overcome all the obstacles and defeat the evil witch. Make him feel like a hero! You will have to pass through hard challenges, based on your skills: move adroitly, calculate fast, solve complex puzzles.

name: Corona Samurai
description: This is your chance to get personal revenge on the infamous virus. It's coming for your village in untold numbers, but with just your swords and shurikens, you'll show the world how it's really done.

name: Ultra Bushwick
description: An indie twin-stick shooter set in Bushwick, Brooklyn, made by one guy from Queens. Fight wave after wave of your gentrifying neighbors for the money you need to pay rent. Also, herd some cats for power-ups.

name: Vacuulus
description: In a small remote town, the decades-old legend of The Vacuum Man seems like nothing more than a silly hoax. But one messy, unruly young boy is about to learn the true horror that defined the legend. Experience playing as the boy, sneaking for your survival as the Vacuum Man tries to take you away.

name: Memory Note
description: People live, remember and forget. An endless circle. But I... I never forget.

name: Wizards of the West
description: A western / fantasy top down shooter with a loadout system.

name: After Meeting
description: A man and a woman who live in the same apartment often meet each other when they take the elevator. How will the story develop when they have crashed on each other? This is a casual love decryption game, you need to find the rules. In the process of passing the game, you can discover the story.

name: Millville
description: Build a small village from the grounds up, meet and interact with its people and try to bring all different Villagers into your little town!

name: Oaths of Light
description: Play as a young woman whose life is forever changed by a series of unexpected events.Unfold mysteries, enjoy non-linear storytelling with branching paths based on your choices, and engage in JRPG-inspired battles mixing real-time and turn-based elements.

name: Madness Robots
description: A game where you must protect a ship from an atack of evil robots, with the help of turrets and other devices

name: Riot Control Simulator
description: Take on the role of a Riot Control officer and control a riot. You can either brutally deal with the crowd or use more reasonable options. Will you decide to support a nascent dictatorship?

name: RunDrill
description: RunDrill is a 2D run game.You control the Landrill, a machine that cracks rocks and breaks the ground to advance.Let's run through the vast subterranean world!

name: Elysium Above
description: In SRPG Elysium Above, you will be a Commander of state Bo to direct the heroes to fight against enemies, and defend the newly restored land that has been annexed for 11 years! Wit the era of chaos and excitement with eight heroes!

name: Landers: Black Moon
description: Landers: Black Moon is a sci-fi puzzle game. After the landing of HEX-Rockets on the moon, you need to find the correct positions for the lasers to turn on all the system. What happens next will blow your mind.

name: Mortem: Fallen Kingdom
description: Mortem: Fallen Kingdom is an open world souls-like RPG. Explore the world and take part in rewarding action combat.

name: Mediterranean Assault: 1943
description: Delivering Hectic firefights, Mediterranean Assault: 1943 takes players across some of Italy and Africa's forgotten fronts.

name: Shleepy Time Catching Z's
description: Can't sleep and you can't imagine sheep? Catch the sheep with the bed and bounce them succesfully to the other side, faster and faster, while avoiding or defeating enemies sent by the Sandman.

name: My Little Village
description: My Little Village is a strategic city building game where the player gets to control villagers individually. As a leader you get to improve the skills of each villager and inspect their family trees. Are you ready to be leader of a your little village?

name: Completely Lar Lar
description: This is the first Completely Lar Lar game, which is a platforming puzzle solver in a fantasy mosaic world that's been created in Unity. Help Completely get to the end of the game to beat the boss man dude.

name: Invaliens
description: Retro arcade classic, Defeat a million invaders from another dimension in this side scrolling shoot'em up.

name: Armageddon Onslaught
description: In 2060 the end of the world has come, and humanity is on the edge of extinction. Against the army of Hell, four formidable warriors, known as the Demi-Angels, arise. They will have to face horrors of all kinds and fulfill the darkest of the prophecies.

name: Monstermonger
description: A strategic fantasy digital board game. Build a team to capture monsters. Choose whether to sell them for gold, or tame them and use their skills to help capture even bigger monsters. Gold now, or more gold later - only you can decide!

name: Be: Twin
description: Be:Twin is a top-down shooter set in an aplocalyptic version of Seoul. What will happen once the twins find what they have lost?

name: Feeling Square?
description: This game is hard; back to the basics of pixel graphics, the goal of the game is to reach the end of the level. You will die over and over again learning the in and out of the levels. How long will you take? can you beat the game with your sanity still in tack? Now with Update 2.0!!

name: Sponsor-A-Planet
description: First-Person world-creation-simulator game!

name: Baby Bear's Big Day Out
description: After coming out of hibernation early, you need to find honey to wake up the rest of your bear family! Solve dozens of puzzles in this cute sokoban-style adventure, while meeting other woodland animals. Discover your surroundings as you explore peaceful meadows, icy valleys and bubbling swamps!

name: Nopperabou
description: It is a search-type horror game set in a mansion where curses live."Nopperabo" who became a curse after the tragic event You reached the end,Can you enshrine the curse?

name: hexceed: Cessabit Pack
description: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Cessabit brings 125 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!

name: hexceed: Inventa Pack
description: The sixth addition to hexceed, bringing 110 exciting new levels! This world includes all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Mr. Walker's Basement
description: Will you be able to escape the horrors that unfold under your neighbor's home? This atmospheric point-and-click survival horror game with elements of mystery and story-rich scares will leave you DYING to uncover the truth. Beware the wax figures that lurk in the basement....

name: Liberty Fighters
description: Liberty Fighters is a classic retro shoot’em up game with mixed rpg elements that adds an unique touch to this game. You explore a space station full of interactive characters and make impactful choices through the story. Fight action tense space combat missions with your upgradable spaceship.

name: Wotheguel
description: Do the tasks given in the tropical forest and get all the magic diamonds. Kill the resulting creatures and continue your mission. Protect yourself in the open world and remember that you are alone.

name: Caste
description: Bring life back to the the world of Caste! Join a fantasy world together with many other players online. Build your house and place furniture inside. Build your farm with a huge variety of crops!

name: Floor 100
description: Floor 100 is a Free-to-play Topdown 2D Multiplayer Online RPG with many common MMO features and a competitive tower with 100 floors of epic bosses.

name: VR King of Battle Cards
description: A fantasy-style card game submerges you in the history of the world of Phantor, which was invaded by the evil and cruel King Revelant. Take part in the battles for liberation of the world as part of the Union of Kings. Gather your army and defeat Revelant in the epic battle.

name: Forever Night
description: Action adventure game with a great and atmospheric storyline and open world

name: Dash and Fire
description: "Dash and fire" uses hand-painted super fire animation style, and is famous for its shocking and refreshing sense of attack. Precise attack judgment, hard straight, floating, combo, body and other pure fighting game settings are designed to bring players the top-level action game experience.

name: Enlightened Sentinel
description: Enlightened Sentinel - spectacular battles and tranquil exploration. From shady forests to the royal castle - the hero has a difficult path ahead. Sword and magic will help the Enlightened one to walk through a deeply thought out colorful world.

name: Knitted and Inflatable
description: Knitted And Inflatable is a story about the stand-off between The World of Knitted and The World of Inflatable. It's a fresh look onto First Person Shooters that brings challenge, physics and cute visuals without blood, gore and violence!

name: Ultimate Under Water
description: Ultimate Under Water is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cute low-poly under water fishes on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with fishes with your mouse.

name: LightWave
description: Lightwave is a platformer project gone full indie. Inspired by classic platformers and modern indie titles alike, this 2D pixel platformer features highspeed, fluid movement.

name: Velucity
description: VELUCITY, a rhythm game with a new feel, is released in Steam through Early Access! Enjoy the game with a keyboard that anyone can easily start with.

name: I Lost My Luggage
description: I Lost My Luggage is a chaotic organization game. Find people their lost luggage back, and keep the facility organized!

name: Sherman Commander
description: Command a platoon of Sherman tanks over the most famous theatres of WW2. Take the commander’s seat and give specific orders to your crew, or open the tactical map to coordinate your actions with accompanying units.

name: Dragu's Puzzle Adventure
description: Guide Dragu in this 3D Puzzle Adventure and try the challenging stages!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Streets Puzzles
description: Puzzles of streets!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 3
description: Puzzles of incredible random images!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Sports Puzzles
description: Puzzles about sports!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Abandoned Places Puzzles
description: Puzzles of intriguing abandoned places!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Mexico Puzzles
description: Puzzles about Mexico!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Japan Puzzles
description: Puzzles about Japan!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - SJP Monuments Puzzles
description: All puzzles included in Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Monuments!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Rodents
description: Puzzles of rodents!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Reptiles
description: Puzzles of beautiful reptiles!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Puzzles 2
description: Puzzles of incredible random images!Content: 30 Puzzles in 4 levels of difficulty.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Halloween Puzzles
description: Puzzles about Halloween!
